name: com.metris.xposed.pmods

releases.description:
- Fixed inability to hide more than 3 apps

Plus all the addition from the previous version:
- [NEW!] Biometric authentication
- Fixed crash when entering settings or rotating the screen
- Fixed crash when enabling developer options
- Fixed "hide app" menu not appearing on first click
- Fixed many UI glitches
- Fixed purchase not recognized
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Fixed inability to hide more than 3 apps

Plus all the addition from the previous version:

  • [NEW!] Biometric authentication
  • Fixed crash when entering settings or rotating the screen
  • Fixed crash when enabling developer options
  • Fixed "hide app" menu not appearing on first click
  • Fixed many UI glitches
  • Fixed purchase not recognized

releases.description:
- [FIXED] Rare case of app not hiding
- [FIXED] Standard search on 703-906
- More logging
- New button to share feedback
- Many improvements
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [FIXED] Rare case of app not hiding
  • [FIXED] Standard search on 703-906
  • More logging
  • New button to share feedback
  • Many improvements

releases.description:
- [FIXED] New app installs not showing up in the drawer
- [NEW] Enable debug flags for the launcher
- Enable debug log option. Enable this before sending me your logs
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [FIXED] New app installs not showing up in the drawer
  • [NEW] Enable debug flags for the launcher
  • Enable debug log option. Enable this before sending me your logs

releases.description:
Hotfix menu not showing up

Plus the previous additions:
- Improved injections
- Fixed scrollbar position
- Fixed app reappearing after search
- Official compatibility with Android 12
releases.descriptionHTML:
Hotfix menu not showing up

Plus the previous additions:

releases.name: 1.0.4-b3
releases.description: - Fixed app reappearing after search on Android 12+ (beta)
releases.descriptionHTML: • Fixed app reappearing after search on Android 12+ (beta)

releases.name: 1.0.4-b2
releases.description: - Fixed app reappearing after search on Android 12 (still in beta phase)
releases.descriptionHTML: • Fixed app reappearing after search on Android 12 (still in beta phase)

releases.name: 1.0.4-b1
releases.description:
- [ANDROID 12] Home menu support fixed (beta)
- Fixed a rare case where the app would not leave the splash screen
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [ANDROID 12] Home menu support fixed (beta)
  • Fixed a rare case where the app would not leave the splash screen

releases.description:
- Initial Android 12 (S) support

WARNING! LSPOSED version 1.6.1 contains a bug preventing modules to be properly loaded. If you are affected by this bug please disable/enable Pixel Mods, then force stop the Pixel Launcher.
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Initial Android 12 (S) support

WARNING! LSPOSED version 1.6.1 contains a bug preventing modules to be properly loaded. If you are affected by this bug please disable/enable Pixel Mods, then force stop the Pixel Launcher.

releases.description:
- [ANDROID 10+] Now you can hide every app, even synthesized ones
- Better management of app state changes and preferences updates
- New SplashScreen
- Various bugfix and optimizations

Android 12 support coming soon!
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [ANDROID 10+] Now you can hide every app, even synthesized ones
  • Better management of app state changes and preferences updates
  • New SplashScreen
  • Various bugfix and optimizations

Android 12 support coming soon!

releases.description: - Fixed inability to hide Pixel Mods icon from the home screen
releases.descriptionHTML: • Fixed inability to hide Pixel Mods icon from the home screen

releases.description:
- Fixed translations
- Fixed bug in the welcome screen
releases.descriptionHTML:
• Fixed translations
  • Fixed bug in the welcome screen

releases.description:
- First release
- Compatible with pixel launcher versions 26, 31, 103, 150, 151, 201, 204, 301, 400, 401, 502, 504, 507, 509, 602, 603, 604, 701, 703, 815, 820, 821, 825
- Android 12 not supported yet (I currently don't have any devices to test)
releases.descriptionHTML:
• First release
  • Compatible with pixel launcher versions 26, 31, 103, 150, 151, 201, 204, 301, 400, 401, 502, 504, 507, 509, 602, 603, 604, 701, 703, 815, 820, 821, 825
  • Android 12 not supported yet (I currently don't have any devices to test)

readme:
Pixel Mods is a new module that let you to finally tidy up your messy launcher with style! Long click on the home screen to access its main interface and you will be able to hide the apps you want to (3 apps can be hidden for free, then paying a small amount gives you access to everything).


It also has these functions:
- Enable debug flags in the launcher


All changes happens instantaneously, you won't even notice them!

More features may come in the future and will be included in the same purchase you've already done!


**PS. Rootless pixel launcher is NOT supported, and never will be.**

**WARNING**: You need to make a small in-app purchase to unlock all functions.
